OK so heres my question. he "raped" (im sure it STARTED that way) 30 women, right? but the doctor chick was all "and everyone he raped was sad when he was caught because they couldn't fuck him anymore". implying that, while they resisted at first, they all ended up like the main character and enjoyed it part way. meaning every time they did it afterwords was not rape technically, since they wanted it and consented it by the time the first time was finished.

Therefore, how can he have been "caught"? The girls wouldn't have turned him in since by this point, they wanted it. If the husbands/boyfriends/bystanders saw what happened and called the police, the women would just go "nope, this is consensual, I'm cheating on my husband right now" and its no longer a legal issue (for the dude)...so how was he arrested? You could argue it was for something else, but the implication is that he was caught with one of his 30 women, all of whom were reported to be "sad" that he was gone.

A normal pregnancy is 40 weeks and a month has four weeks, so 10 lunar months where each is 7*4=28 days long. If you use calendar months which are on average 30.5 days long you get 9.2 months. So even in this case the last pregnancy week is in the beginning of the 10th month because the first 30/31 days are not the 0th month but 1st month. Tl;dr: Normal pregnancy ends in the 10th month.
